attributes.review: Horrible just Horrible🙄, I opened the app and I saw a really fat orange 🍊I was terrified for my life I had no idea of what to do😰 so I ran out of my room and I took my phone with me so that my mom can delete the app but little did she know what she was the most horrific thing ever instead of a orange 🍊 it was a big very old ugly Cheeto puff🟠, so we ran out of the house next think you know the Cheeto🟠 started talking and it said “China China China😙👌🏼” very very scary, the Cheeto also said “ We’RE gOIng To BuILD a WaLl🟠😙👌🏼” and after that we realized it was that rapist, racist president🤢🤮, so then we said “trump 2020.... in a grave six feet under❤️🧚🏼‍♂️ ✨” so don’t get this app if you’re terrified by oranges 🍊 and Cheetos🟠
